# BoldKit - Neubrutalism UI Component Library

> BoldKit is an open-source React component library featuring neubrutalism design aesthetics. Built on top of shadcn/ui with Radix UI primitives and Tailwind CSS.

## Overview

BoldKit provides 40+ beautifully crafted UI components with:
- Bold, high-contrast neubrutalism styling
- Thick borders (3px default)
- Hard drop shadows (no blur)
- Vibrant color palette (coral, teal, yellow)
- Zero border radius for raw aesthetic
- Full dark mode support
- TypeScript support
- Accessible components via Radix UI

## Installation

```bash
npx boldkit-ui init
```

Or add individual components:
```bash
npx boldkit-ui add button
```

## Components

### Layout & Containers
- Card - Container with thick borders and shadows
- Layered Card - Stacked paper depth effect
- Dialog - Modal window with neubrutalism styling
- Drawer - Slide-in panel
- Sheet - Side panel overlay
- Accordion - Expandable content sections
- Collapsible - Toggle content visibility
- Tabs - Tabbed interface
- Scroll Area - Custom scrollbar styling

### Form Controls
- Button - Multiple variants (primary, secondary, accent, destructive, outline, ghost)
- Input - Text input field
- Textarea - Multi-line text input
- Checkbox - Toggle checkboxes
- Radio Group - Single-select options
- Select - Dropdown selection
- Switch - Toggle switch
- Slider - Range input
- Input OTP - One-time password input
- Label - Form labels

### Feedback & Status
- Alert - Callout messages
- Alert Dialog - Confirmation dialogs
- Badge - Status indicators
- Progress - Progress bars
- Skeleton - Loading placeholders
- Sonner/Toast - Notification toasts

### Navigation
- Breadcrumb - Navigation path
- Dropdown Menu - Action menus
- Pagination - Page navigation
- Command - Command palette

### Data Display
- Avatar - User images with fallback
- Table - Data tables
- Hover Card - Hover-triggered cards
- Tooltip - Contextual hints
- Calendar - Date picker

### Decorative (Neubrutalism Special)
- Sticker - Rotated labels with tape effect
- Stamp - Circular approval badges
- Marquee - Auto-scrolling text ticker

## Design Tokens

### Colors (HSL)
- Primary (Coral): 0 84% 71%
- Secondary (Teal): 174 62% 56%
- Accent (Yellow): 49 100% 71%
- Destructive: 0 84% 60%
- Success: 152 69% 69%
- Warning: 49 100% 60%
- Info: 212 100% 73%

### Neon Colors
- Neon Pink: 330 100% 65%
- Neon Green: 120 100% 50%
- Neon Blue: 195 100% 50%

### Shadows
- Default: 4px 4px 0px (no blur)
- Small: 2px 2px 0px
- Medium: 6px 6px 0px
- Large: 8px 8px 0px
- XL: 12px 12px 0px

### Borders
- Default width: 3px
- Border color: foreground color
- Border radius: 0 (square corners)

## Tech Stack

- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Radix UI Primitives
- Class Variance Authority (CVA)
- Vite

## Registry

BoldKit is compatible with shadcn/ui registry format:
- Registry index: https://boldkit.dev/registry.json
- Individual components: https://boldkit.dev/[component-name].json
